title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Climate and Agriculture: Climatic requirement for crop growth and development, Issues and approaches to climate change; Climate change, agriculture and sustainability. Impact Assessment: Assessing climate change impacts on agriculture; Use of crop models for climate change impact assessment; Hydrological cycle; Soil carbon sequestration .Food Security: Climate change and tropical agriculture; Climate change and organic agriculture; Crop production in dryland regions; Risk assessment and food security.Adaptation Strategies: Climate change, global agriculture and regional vulnerability; Evaluation of adaptation strategies; Research and development for countering climate change.
